img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in a battle with a large, shadowy creature emerging from a misty, snowy environment. The character, wielding a polearm weapon, is poised for combat on an icy surface. The interface displays various icons and gauges, likely representing health, abilities, or items. The name "Lang-Li-Guht-Lang" appears at the bottom of the screen, possibly indicating the name of the enemy or the current mission. The setting is a wintry landscape with snow-covered trees and rocks.
